name: Daniel Cadenas
bio: Daniel Cadenas is a computer engineer with 20+ year of experience in Business Intelligence, Data Warehousing, and Big Data. Currently, working as a Big Data Engineer at Ultimate Software, he is involved in building applications using Spark and Hadoop. Also, Daniel posses several certifications such as Cloudera Administration and Google Professional Data Engineer. Daniel is a Data Scientist enthusiast with hands-on experience with machine learning and deep learning.

name: Luis Casadesus
bio: Luis has over 17 years of professional experience designing, developing, testing, implementing and maintaining software applications using Microsoft and Java technologies. Amazed by the simplicity of maintaining and implementing code using the cloud environment, he stays updated with the new tools and technologies related to this world. He strive to create a positive a shared knowledge environment. He is a big sports fan and loves to play with Nerf/xshot guns with his son.

name: Kimoy Kotun
bio: Kimoy's background is in Mathematics. She has been working as a Data Scientist for over a year. She enjoys using data to solve problems.

name: Layla Bouzoubaa
bio: Layla is a research analyst at the University of Miami Miller School of Medicine where she gets to combine her passion for R programming with cancer, substance abuse research, and behavioral health. She is also a D&I advocate, an organizer for R-Ladies Miami, and a #IamRemarkable facilitator. Aside from her professional loves, she is a zealous plant-mom and a wannabe wine connoisseur and food critic.

name: Viviana Marquez
bio: Viviana is Data Scientist at Zimmerman Advertising. MS in Data Science with a background in mathematics and journalism.

name: Kavin Kannan
bio: Curiosity sparked interest at the early age of 10 while playing the classic snake game. While figuring out how the game worked, that interest turned into passion. Fast forward 22 years, Kavin is now an experienced full stack engineer with a demonstrated history of delivering enterprise applications from stem to stern. He is also an avid enthusiast in developing IoT, Mobile and Web apps on Google Cloud Platform.

name: Roly Vicaria
bio: Roly is a technology and data nerd who earned his BS and MS in Computer Science from Florida International University. He has been working in South Florida tech in various engineering roles for the last 10 years, having worked at Ultimate Software, Magic Leap, and currently at TaxFyle.

name: Danielle Cox
bio: Danielle Cox has been developing for 35 years. She is currently being paid mostly for Kotlin/PHP coding, but has convinced her company to use Flutter going forward. After being invited to Google I/O, she has launched the Flutterfly YouTube channel hoping to convert even more people.

name: Mash Zahid
bio: Mash Zahid is a management consultant who codes artificial intelligence systems that leverage sophisticated predictive and prescriptive methods to deliver omni-channel growth in competitive global markets. Mash has had successful strategy and data science engagements in recent years at Amgen, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Gartner, Johnson & Johnson, Subaru, and hedge funds.

name: Darlene Holland
bio: As an immigrant, and a minority woman, Darlene's passion is to advocate for equitable education for all students and to encourage girls and minority students to thrive academically, especially in STEM. She started teaching science in 2007 after obtaining a BS in Biological Sciences and a BA in Sociology at FAU and received her MS.Ed in Science Education at NSU. She completed a Web Development certificate program at UM which kicked her involvement with Girls Who Code in 2018. She loves the work that GWC is doing to increase diversity in the tech industry.

name: Yasmary Hernandez Diaz
bio: Yasmary (aka Yaz) made the executive decision to become a programmer at the age of 9 when she deleted Windows 3.1 via DOS (and then deleted UnDelete). She is passionate about nurturing tech Communities as well as helping women, underrepresented groups, and students in tech. Yaz has tried over 1,400+ unique beers (= Beer Snob) and brews her own beer!

name: Ruth Llanos-Vos
bio: Ruth is part of the Product and Strategy Team at Ultimate Software, a leading cloud provider of global HCM solutions. In her role as Vendor and Technical Manager she is responsible for the management of contract manufacturer vendors to build best in class UltiPro Time Collection Devices. Throughout her career she has always been an active member of diversity and inclusion groups, the latest being AnitaB.Org South Florida Liaison Women in Tech Leader. In addition, she is a Board Member of Latinas in Computing (AnitaB.org Systers Affinity Groups) and an #IamRemarkable facilitator.

name: Dr. Stephen Borstelmann
bio: Ivy-educated Interventional Radiologist Physician / former Investment Banker & Quantitative Analyst at home in the operating room, AI lab, or boardroom. Stephan is a physician who understand the strategic, operational, and financial business needs of provider and insurer.

name: Carlos Chacin
bio: Loves learning in his free time, Carlos make tools, guides, documentation, and live tutorials.

name: Angel Lacret
bio: Angel is a technical Product Manager. He is a Web and Mobile Developer using React,Django,Firebase and @8base. He is the founder of Cobuild Lab, a company aimed at promoting Customer Driven Development.
